# ============================================================================
# GENERATED BY PARA, PopcornSAR
# Copyright(c) 2024 by PopcornSAR Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.
# ============================================================================
 
add_executable(${PARA_APP_NAME})
 
# ============================================================================
# Find required packages
# ============================================================================

# ============================================================================
# This setting is required for binary targets.
# Please modify the section below to suit your configuration.
# ============================================================================
Para_Target(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PARA_LIBS_PRIVATE core log exec com
            PARA_GEN_DIR ${PARA_APP_GEN_DIR}
            OUTPUT_NAME ${PARA_APP_NAME}
)

# Require C++17 for path optimizer (std::filesystem etc.)
target_compile_features(${PARA_APP_NAME} PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
set_target_properties(${PARA_APP_NAME} PROPERTIES CXX_STANDARD 17 CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

# ============================================================================
target_include_directories(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                           PRIVATE
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../external/Rosless-Lanelet2/include)
# ============================================================================
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                      PRIVATE
                      pthread)

# Build Path_Optimizer as a subproject and link its library
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../Path_Optimizer_ros2 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Path_Optimizer_ros2_build)
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME} PRIVATE path_optimizer_lib)

# ============================================================================
target_sources(${PARA_APP_NAME}
               PRIVATE
               exe_pathoptimizer/aa/port/pport_po2mvp.cpp
               exe_pathoptimizer/aa/port/pport_po2pe.cpp
               exe_pathoptimizer/aa/port/rport_ebs2po.cpp
               exe_pathoptimizer/aa/port/rport_scr2po.cpp
               exe_pathoptimizer/aa/swc_pathoptimizer.cpp
               ros2/ros_autosar_adapter.cpp
               main.cpp
)
